name: Silvers Rayleigh
text: On Play: Choose up to two of your opponents characters. Until the end of your opponents next turn, give one character -3000 power, and the other -2000 power. After this, KO up to one of your opponents characters with a power of 3000 or lower.

effect.text: Choose up to two of your opponents characters. Until the end of your opponents next turn, give one character -3000 power, and the other -2000 power. After this, KO up to one of your opponents characters with a power of 3000 or lower.
